to read the archives but not have anything clog up your box.... Just another
suggestion...

Blessings,
Stephanie

protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.

messages.subject: Re: until 2000
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/19/99 3:54:22 PM Eastern Standard Time, brynlee@telus.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/19/99 3:54:22 PM Eastern Standard Time,
brynlee@... writes:

<< Is there a website where I can read the digests of the discussions ???
when I have time? I will wait to hear an answer before I unsub.
Thanks. >>

If you go to onelist put in your e-mail address and your password your
account will come up. Change your preference to read digest or something like
that. You won't be unsubbing and you can change back whenever you like.

Laura

messages.subject: until 2000
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there friends, I am unsubbing for a while (maybe til the new Year) as my husband is coming home (he s been away for 5 weeks). I will miss the discussions
messages.messageBody:
Hi there friends,
I am unsubbing for a while (maybe til the new Year) as my husband is coming
home (he's been away for 5 weeks). I will miss the discussions with you
all. Is there a website where I can read the digests of the discussions ???
when I have time? I will wait to hear an answer before I unsub.
Thanks.


Brooke in BC
brynlee@...
